name: Aloo Sabzi
instructions: Peel and cube potatoes. Sauté onion, tomato, and chili in oil with turmeric. Add potatoes, cook until tender.

name: Dal Tadka
instructions: Cook dal until soft. In ghee, fry cumin, garlic, onion, tomato, and chili. Mix into dal and simmer.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Cook onion and tomato puree with spices. Add butter, cream, and paneer cubes. Simmer until thick.

name: Chana Masala
instructions: Cook chickpeas. Prepare onion-tomato base with spices. Mix in chickpeas and simmer.

name: Vegetable Pulao
instructions: Sauté onion, chili, and spices in ghee. Add vegetables and rice. Cook with water until fluffy.

name: Masoor Dal
instructions: Cook dal with turmeric. Fry onion, garlic, and tomato in oil. Mix into dal.

name: Bhindi Fry
instructions: Slice and fry okra until half done. Add onion, tomato, and spices. Cook until crisp.

name: Cabbage Sabzi
instructions: Shred cabbage. Fry mustard seeds, onion, and chili. Add cabbage and turmeric, cook until soft.

name: Palak Paneer
instructions: Blanch spinach and puree. Cook onion, tomato, and garlic with spices. Add spinach puree and paneer.

name: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Cook potato and cauliflower with onion, tomato, ginger, and spices until tender.
